data.name: MocapForStreamer
data.detailed_description:
PLEASE TRY DEMO VERSION FIRST

Make sure the app works in your environment before purchase. The demo version has limited functionality only for data export and background color settings.


About the Software

This is a Windows application for upper body motion capture using 2 webcams of the same model as stereo cameras.

No special equipment required

You can capture upper body, hand, and facial expression if you have the followings, without the need for special equipments:
  • a middle range PC
  • 2 webcams of the same model
The captured motion can be exported via the VMC protocol.

What is the difference with MocapForAll?

MocapForStreamer greatly simplifies set-up, such as camera calibration, by limiting the functionality to capturing the upper body only and imposing constraints on the cameras.

data.short_description: Windows application for upper body motion capture using 2 webcams of the same model as stereo cameras. Capture upper body, hand, and facial expression.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windwos 10 64bit
  • Processor: 1.1GHz quad-core processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windwos 10 64bit
  • Processor: 4.5GHz quad-core processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1080 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
